title: Trump pardons four founders of BitMEX cryptocurrency exchange convicted of money laundering
summary: Trump has granted full pardons to BitMEX co-founders Arthur Hayes, Benjamin Delo, and Samuel Reed, who were convicted of violating the Bank Secrecy Act for failing to implement anti-money laundering controls
